CustomField.formula: CASE(TEXT(OPRO_Num__r.Opportunity__r.PGo__c), "0%","0% - Closed Lost or Closed Cancelled", "0","0% - Customer has no interest", ".01","1% - Selling the aircraft", ".10","10% - Keeping the aircraft", "0.1","10% - Opportunity loaded", "0.10","10% - Opportunity identified, no budget requested", "0.20","20% - Budget Requested or Prime Win Percentage", "0.35","35% - Identified and qualified end user requirement or Prime Win Percentage", "0.50","50% - Budget Approved", ".50","50% - Budget availability at risk", "0.5","50% - Identified Customer has a need", ".500","50% - Prime Win Percentage", "0.500","50% - RFI Received", ".75","75% - Prime Win Percentage", "0.75","75% - RFP Issued to primes", "0.900","90% - Protest possible/likely", "0.90","90% - Prime in Lead", "1.","100% - Bids Closed and Prime Selected", "1.000000","100% - Fully Funded", "1.00000","100% - Funded Follow on", "1.0","100% - Government Award in place, protest period past", "1","100% - No Budget availability issues are identified", "1.000","100% - Renewal", "1.00","100% - RFP/RFQ Received", "1.0000","100% - Verbal Confirmation or Public Announcement",null)
CustomField.label: PGo
